entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is speaking to Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and is having a conversation with Hagrid and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is exchanging looks with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and is mentioned as not having rows with the rest of the Heads of House.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is mentioned by Hagrid.

entities.name: argus filch
entities.description: Argus Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts and appears in the scene.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as not having rows with the rest of the Heads of House.
